roleset.name: the act of speeding up
roleset.note: Based on sentences in Bolt. Comparison to accelerate.01. Accelerate.01 is a member of VN class 45.4-other_cos. No FN class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: many argms
example.text: The quake has the highest peak ground acceleration ever recorded.

example.name: with args
example.text: The egg's acceleration due to gravity caused it to smash upon impact with the ground.
